website_summaries.verdict: All of the features of Shark's higher end model except the WiFi. Operation and scheduling are conducted with a remote.
pros: Schedule cleanings and control operation through a remote
Cleans about 2,000 square feet before needing recharging
Includes a strip that you can use to prevent it from entering certain areas, or to cover up a spot you don't want cleaned
cons: You must read the directions on how to schedule cleanings using the remote — don't try to wing it

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Job and without supervision. Hell, it is smarter than my wife!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Dillehay

customer_reviews.title: Needs bigger storage
customer_reviews.text: It’s great does a great job cleaning I’ve seen a real improvement in my house but I’ve got to dump it out a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amber Minter-Owsiany

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a base level of the shark, maintain s the floors clean, it's a cool feature of setting up a time to autostart,
customer_reviews.author: jose dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck a lot. The app does not work well and that is not good considering it does not come with a remote control so you are depending on the app. You call the 800 number for help with the app and they don't really help much. I'm waiting to see if they fix the app, if they don't I will be returning to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: jose nunez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh ... I am in LOVE Mr. SHARKIE!!! Best thing since sliced bread!! He cleans far better than I ever dreamed he would! Gets lost a bit ... but i'm learning his 'no-go' zones ... and installing strips ... A few places he got tangled into fringe on rugs - I turned the fringe under the rug ... he goes right over it ... and on to the floor. And - I'm amazed at how much dust and fuzz from carpets I empty! One of the BEST purchases I ever made!
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: impressed!
customer_reviews.text: did some research before purchasing the shark ION robot vacuum cleaner. Needed one for carpet and would pick up dog hair. Did not have my hopes up that it would work, but boy did it ! after the first run, open up the dirt bin and was shocked at all the hair and dander it picked up. Did have to put up barriers so it would not go into the kitchen and at first stayed by the steps, but it stopped and turned around. Very happy that i chose this vacuum for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Coia

customer_reviews.title: "Rosie" cleans the floors while we do other things.s
customer_reviews.text: Need to prep the rooms for cords or other things that can get caught in machine. Does a good job on bits & pieces that come in on shoes and on dust, hair and crumbs present on hard surfaces or carpeting. Alerts when dirt bin is full. Easy to clean out. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.S. - High Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Helper
customer_reviews.text: Love that it cleans up & goes back to its docking station to recharge
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Item inoperable
customer_reviews.text: The product was not ready for sale. It was inoperable with fault codes flashing while it was trying to charge. Thanks for the quick response and for attempting to resolve the issues before I returned the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: has a severe case of CRS
customer_reviews.text: when it gets under a coffee table, or kitchen it cant get out it keeps going around in the same circle bumping into the same stuff over and over , very sporadic cleaning pattern
customer_reviews.author: xjbenn

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I bought it for. Keeping the dirt off the floors so my wife isn't trying to sweep or vacuum all the time. Doesn't get every single thing off the floor or in every nook and cranny but neither did my vacuum. Keeps the floors fairly clean. We are happy.
customer_reviews.author: wildjokr

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased 😀!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Was very easy to set-up. We love it! The dogs couldn’t care less! There’s a threshold going going from the carpet in the bedroom to the hardwood floor in the living room that it can’t get up, but we remedy that by place a bath mat there as a ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Gets up dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Wife loves it, and so do I! Dog not so much! Dog sheds ALOT! Mr. Jaws (wife named it) gets it all up! Got the 720 factory refurb for 135.00, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished and it works just like new. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it, then your house is clean
customer_reviews.text: I set it and forget it. I’ve got it scheduled to go off and it goes off and cleans my house and if it misses an area it goes back and cleans it again. We have about 2300 ft.2 and it cleans half the house one day and the other half the next day and thennit repeats. Be sure to pick up your cords
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live life without this thing? I’ve never had one issue, it’s literally exceeded all my expectations, so just buy it! It’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Shark Robot Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the random pattern. I love that I can set it on it's way and get other work completed while the robot vacuum cleans another room...by its self. It's great for under beds and dressers!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Leon

customer_reviews.title: scheduling seems glitchy.
customer_reviews.text: this does not seem to allow us to set a schedule so that it runs the same time every day. We have to turn it on manually to get it to go. Other than this, we are pleased with the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl N.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must have
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good vacuum but it has trouble finding docking sometimes otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New ‘must have’ for the house
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo does more than you think it will it does get stuck in some funny places sometimes, but we’re learning how to alleviate those.
customer_reviews.author: Don Morris

customer_reviews.title: Just The Helper I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Set up in no time: put brushes on bottom, plug charger into wall, and done! I use this machine to zoom around my house in between my deep cleaning vacuuming jobs - it kind of is hit or miss on some areas, but I love the scheduled cleaning function!
customer_reviews.author: DYANNE D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Loved this little guy but exactly one year old and he no longer wants to work. So disappointed now.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Decent robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Good robot for the price. It keeps the floors and carpet clean when scheduled daily. I would have given 5 stars but some mornings the robot did not come on as scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon White

customer_reviews.title: It cleans good
customer_reviews.text: Love my Shark , it cleans so much better then the Roomba. And it docks its self where the Roomba dies before it gets to the dock
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Closer cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get close enough to floor and cupboards. It would be helpful if the buyer could make adjustments for closer cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: June M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was refurbished and it started making noise sent it back easy return when it did work it did well on pet hair not so good on dirt
customer_reviews.author: sandra hale

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT charge!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of this and neither would charge when hooked up. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Works for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mother and so far it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra Edeh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. I have two cats and a dog and this vacuum puts in work for an hour doing darn good cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know I was getting a refurbished vacuum. Very disappointed. Need to know if I can buy an extended warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: jacque wilson

customer_reviews.title: Shark Robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It does an amazing job. It is vey quiet and efficient. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Work awesome, it was a gift for my daughter in law. And she loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Neely

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I ever bought myself for my BFF for Christmas. Every home should have one it’s absolutely divine
customer_reviews.author: Janice B savoie

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum it’s been amazing with my two dogs and cat!
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the roomba
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome, fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Appearance was not as listed.
customer_reviews.text: The item was not in the physical condition listed. The logo is missing paint and many scratches.
customer_reviews.author: nicole ohm

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works great! It is refurbished but came just like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ad is misleading
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing stating this item is refurbished. I would not have purchase a refurbished item.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Beard

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had it for a year and doesn’t work anymore.? Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love coming home to find my hardwood floors clean.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Works above and beyond!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with the dust in my house. The first few times i have used it i was very suprised at how much it picked up. I feel like it is really deep cleaning every time it runs. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Shark RV720
customer_reviews.text: Bought a refurbished unit. Box was a little rough but the actual unit looked brand new. No issues with the operation of the rv720. Cleans better than it really has a right to. Needless to say it will never replace a big home vacuum cleaner but it does a superb job nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Skid Bezerkowitz

customer_reviews.title: To loud
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the word Renewed, I thought it meant a renewed design not refurbished. I would of never bought it. It's LOUD and it could not find its way back to the dock. Very disappointed. I really wanted a robot to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mull

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love my wally looks like new and works like new! Worth every penny!!! Highly recommended for everyone. Don’t buy the new one get a renewed one same thing as the new one
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but turned off by not being low profile.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and performed perfectly. Unfortunately the knobs on the top kept it from going under my furniture I had already lifted for Eufy, which has a much lower profile.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great for light cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I love this for in between deep cleaning. We have 4 dogs so it helps to keep up with the hair. The only downside is it doesn't get along furniture, cabinets or corners very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brown.

customer_reviews.title: Works well well on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one , we have hardwood floors but have pets and it helps a lot !! I don’t know how it would be on carpet
customer_reviews.author: jmick

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a Shark Robot and LOVE it - bought one for my sister for Xmas. Haven't heard a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work, unable to find dock station, did not vaccum up items as promised. Damaged good. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Comsumer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work right out of the box it just spun around in the middle of the floor. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately...
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 uses, it now just spins in circles. Works rather well for being so small. But a 1 star from me for breaking so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Buchmann

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Will always have a robot vac in my house. Can't believe ALL the stuff that comes from the carpet and tile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, but I will dust mop after using it and will still have a lot of dust.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Shark ION Robot Dual-Action Robot Vacuum Cleaner with 1-Hour Plus of Cleaning Time, Smart Sensor Navigation and Remote Control (RV720) (Renewed)
product_meta.description: If you have pets, kids, or just a habit of eating all over your home, your floors could always use a quick cleaning. You don't have to bust out the big vacuum every day though, you can just press a button and bring out the Shark Ion Robot 72 Vacuum. This robotic vacuum cleaner does all of the work for you. Either press a button onboard and tell it to get to work or schedule cleanings throughout the week with the remote control. This little guy has a low profile design, edge cleaning, and a smart sensor that all help it navigate around obstacles and underneath furniture while still picking up all the debris it can find. When it's all done cleaning, it'll head back to its charging station. Instead of startling the little ones in your house, send our your secret agent to clean your home on the sly, the Shark Ion Robot 72 Vacuum.
feature_bullets: Smart sensor seamlessly navigates around room and obstacles
Simple onboard controls and easy to use remote control
Spinning side brushes with edge cleaning and brushroll for powerful suction cleaning
Dust bin holds up to 0.4 quarts of dirt and is easy to empty
Start cleaning right away or set a recurring schedule with the remote control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Docking Station, 9-foot BotBoundary Strip, 2BotBoundary Connectors, Scheduling Remote Control, Cleaning Tool, 2 Extra Side Brushes, 1 Extra HEPA filter
